messages.title: Do you believe that Scotland should be a fairer place to live?
messages.content: Labour promised so much, but on fairness they just haven't delivered. How else can you explain why ordinary families have to pay more and more in tax, while shamefully bankers and millionaires pocket their huge bonuses and dodge paying their fair share? This is Labour's Britain and it's shameful.

messages.title: Rich bankers, millionaires and polluters will all finally be made to pay their fair share.
messages.content: With the Lib Dems, you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn. If you are on a low income, this will mean you don't have to pay any tax. If you earn more than £100,000 you will gain an extra £700.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Implementing a fairer tax plan launched by Vince Cable and myself, ensuring no tax on the first £10,000 earned, and an extra £700 gain for those earning more than £100,000.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In many parts of Scotland the choice is between the Liberal Democrats and Labour.

issues.economy: Labour hasn't delivered on fairness, with ordinary families paying more tax and bankers and millionaires receiving excessive bonuses.

quotes.text: Remember in a Westminster election, the choice in many parts of Scotland is between more of the same with Labour or real change with the Liberal Democrats.

images.caption: Nick Clegg, Leader of the Liberal Democrats
